name: It's Alive ! - TEAM 15
description:
THE GAME ( PLAY IN FULLSCREEN )

A student Game Jam submission where you play as a nice friendly teddy bear, who's innocence you are about to crush, impale, and break in various ways throughout the level in order to complete it !

This may look like a kid friendly game, but trust us, it's not.

THE TEAM

Axelle GLEYEN - Game Artist
Juliette GUILLAUMEL - Game Artist

Morigan LETOURNEAU - Game Programmer
Julien SADARNAC- Game Programmer
Clarence BERARD - Game Programmer

Damien SALGUEIRA - Game Designer
Hugo MONMOUSSEAU - Game Designer
Rémy SCHLAEINTZAUER - Game Designer

Ricardo MORA - Game Producer
Victor CHIOREAN - Game Producer
